General.Description: Ardor is a next generation of Blockchain as a service (Blockchain as a Service (BaaS) provides a fast, low cost, low risk, not fast to allow organizations to cooperate. with each other) basically provides a service for building blockchains for other companies as a service.
General.Features: The first feature, Advanced Architecture: The unique Ardor Platform for Parental Array Architecture allows companies to build their products and services using substrings but still rely on supply chain security. The second, Energy Efficient: The Ardor platform uses the Proof-of-Stake Consensus algorithm to eliminate competition in mining so that nodes can use low power and economic hardware. The third, Blockchain Bloat: String transactions can be removed from blockchain once they are validated, to keep the blockchain lightweight and efficient. The fourth, Reliable & Maintainable Product: Ardor is built on NXT's four years of manufacturing experience and is developed in the most popular Java development language for commercial applications.
General.Technology: Ardor is a Blockchain-as-a-Service (BaaS) platform that allows users to create their own substrings with specific settings for release properties. Also, Ardor is the evolution of the NXT blockchain and provides many advantages over its predecessors, both concerning functionality and scalability.
